list.name: Default
list.comment: Added API for Cert site and DB content (measures ans test products).

task.summary: Added API for Cert site and DB content (measures ans test products).

MESSAGE.value: Was added bower and npm config, gulp file and bower integration task.
Was added to the authorization module and appropriate checks on all controllers and requests.
Was added logout button. 'Authorization' header in request was replaced to 'Authorization' default parameter (were troubles on some servers).
Was added displaying of products, measures and categories images.
Layout of login page, product page and top menu.
Layout of login page, products page and top menu.
Was added categories and measures on product view page.
Was added categories and measures tables in DB, category view page, links to categories. Product list page was divided to product list page and showcase page.
Was added measure view page, links to measures.
Was added ordering functionality (tables of DB, page, links, blocking certificate when product was ordered)
Added API for Cert site and DB content (measures ans test products).
